title: By the King, a proclamation to restraine the planting of tobacco in England and VVales
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Robert Barker, and Iohn Bill ...,
notes: "Giuen at our palace of Westminster the thirtieth day of December, in the seuenteenth yeere of our reign ..."--P. [2].
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (1709:20) and Queen's College (University of Oxford). Library (2371:58).
